title: MCBBS Warning，来个好玩的~
author: 苍白记忆
txt_content:
不知道这样的贴条会不会让大家颤抖~英文机翻，反正我知道你们也不读~2333



 
 MCBBS Warning 

Please carefully read the rules, do not arbitrarily water paste.You are in control of all people every act and every move. If a malicious water paste, will be sent to you at the end of feeding the dragon. Thank you for your support, I wish you happy playing here.

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 第一句就错了...carefully和read换一下位置

replies.author: LRual
replies.txt_content: 光标放上去才发现不是图片= =

replies.txt_content:
